about_the_game:
Welcome to Food GO! Simulator, the ultimate drive-thru experience where your culinary skills are put to the test! In this exciting simulator, you’ll start from humble beginnings and work your way up, serving hungry customers with speed, accuracy, and style.

At first, you’ll have just the basics: a register, and a bag. But as you level up and serve more orders, you'll unlock brand-new kitchen equipment—everything from grills to fryers, and even specialized tools to help you design and create the perfect fast food experience.

Master each station, upgrade your kitchen, and see how far you can go in this fast-paced, food-filled journey. The better your service, the higher your level, and the more cool gadgets you’ll get to help you serve your customers faster than ever before.

Are you ready to become the ultimate drive-thru Expert? Grab your apron, fire up the grill, and dive into the world of Food GO! Simulator!

name: Food GO! Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: i5, i6, i7
  • Graphics: GTX 780 - 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo
